title: Personalities
description: A list of AI personalities, including their preferred victory types and stat focuses.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name for the Personality, commonly is the Leader's name.

preferredVictoryType.description: The victory type major civilizations will pursue (need not be specified in VictoryTypes.json)
preferredVictoryType.title: Preferred Victory Type

production.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on production. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
production.title: Production

food.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on food. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
food.title: Food

gold.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on gold. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
gold.title: Gold

science.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on science. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
science.title: Science

culture.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on culture. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
culture.title: Culture

happiness.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on happiness. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
happiness.title: Happiness

faith.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on faith. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
faith.title: Faith

military.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on military power. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
military.title: Military

aggressive.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on aggressiveness. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
aggressive.title: Aggressive

declareWar.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on declaring war. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
declareWar.title: Declare War

commerce.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on commerce. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
commerce.title: Commerce

diplomacy.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on diplomacy. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
diplomacy.title: Diplomacy

loyal.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on loyalty. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
loyal.title: Loyal

expansion.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on expansion. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
expansion.title: Expansion
